thread.section_title: Hudson Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Trendy hotel is a nice location
thread.title_full: Trendy hotel is a nice location - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Hollie H
title: Trendy hotel is a nice location
text:
Very small rooms, not the cleanest. I had an issue with bugs in my shower which were dealt with immediately (while I was out for dinner). I also received complimentary breakfast for the rest of my stay.
Safe environment for a young girl traveling alone. Very friendly staff. Complimentary bag drop off from check out time. The food is great, though expensive! The bar area is nice and on weekends very busy.
